item.title: Prototype Pair Trading Strategy for Silver ETFs
item.description: In these 2 weeks, I’ll deploy my pair trading algo strategy into my server. I modified the code below from a renowned quant trader, Ernest Chan. The basic idea is to find z-scores through moving average & moving SD of spread. If it’s more than absolute of z-score, I will either short or long the spread depending on the polarity. In the backtesting below (using a pair of silver ETFs as an example), I assumed a hypothetical amount of 10,000 dollars per trade.
